title: kavi pADi unai azhaikka
sahitya:
kavi pADi unai azhaikka tiran illai ammA kannit-tamizhil anda kumara guruvaip-pOla


anupallavi

  bhuvi pOTrum kavi arasan kambanillai tiruppugazh pADum aruNagirinAthanillai
bharaNikku peyar koNDa kUttanillai iru varigaLil kuraL amaitta vaLLuvanillai


caraNam    kaNDadE kATSi koNDadE kOlam enru shuzhanru varum vaiyattiDai uzhanru
koNDu nAn irukkaiyil kaNDU koLLAdadEnO uNDu enadaruL enru nI puganriDa
